ygData.subject: RE: Lava & Corpses  was  Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This particular lavafall has a roof that slopes down just beyond it.  It will push you down beyond the point where you can get back up.  It s a one-way
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Dec 1999, Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> I've recovered 6 or 7 corpses from the lava in Sol A (so far none of them
> mine :-)). In each case, I simply locate with my song, get a levitation and
> then just bounce out over the lava and back to safety before I have the
> chance to float down. In every case, I've been able to /corpse the body

This particular lavafall has a roof that slopes down just
beyond it. It will push you down beyond the point where
you can get back up. It's a one-way trip, levitate or not.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
